channel.title: Multi-hitting
channel.description:
Sup peoples,
I would like to know how do you do the double attack while fighting? By double attack I mean you like attacking with one weapon, then switching to magic or another weapon and being able to hit very fast. I've heard of people doing it but never found out how.
Thanks.

item.title: Multi-hitting
item.dc:creator: @demonic_prat demonic prat
item.description:
@demonic_prat wrote:

easy, use bow, quickly switch to r2h and use crush

Read full topic

item.title: Multi-hitting
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:5, topic:9255”]On FTP, use scimitar, and when the person is to around 20 health, you switch to r2h, click on them quickly to attack, and switch back to scimmy.

No matter what you do after you hit with r2h, you have to wait for a second, so eat a lobster real quick while you wait. This trick is relatively effective, much more so if you have a high ranged level and switch from range to 2h, then to scimmy, because range is very fast you can whittle down their health, switch to R2h for k0, and if k0 fails use scimmy to drive their health back down.[/quote]

Thanks, so far your’s works the best PaulT.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi-hitting
item.dc:creator: @PaulT PaulT
item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

On FTP, use scimitar, and when the person is to around 20 health, you switch to r2h, click on them quickly to attack, and switch back to scimmy.

No matter what you do after you hit with r2h, you have to wait for a second, so eat a lobster real quick while you wait. This trick is relatively effective, much more so if you have a high ranged level and switch from range to 2h, then to scimmy, because range is very fast you can whittle down their health, switch to R2h for k0, and if k0 fails use scimmy to drive their health back down.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi-hitting
item.dc:creator: @Pie_0wnz Pie 0wnz
item.description:
@Pie_0wnz wrote:

DDS, d hally spec n33b.

~Pie

Read full topic

item.title: Multi-hitting
item.dc:creator: @JukuG JukuG
item.description:
@JukuG wrote:

[quote=“Dizzy, post:2, topic:9255”]Impossible. Oh and it’s easy: Attack with one weapon, then equip another, der.

What you can do that is really cool is attack with a rune or dragon scimitar then equip a granite maul, attack with that and a split second after the maul attacks, use it’s special twice to attack 2 more times really fast.

Oh and what I mean by impossible is that the attack interval will still have effect even if you switch weapons. Of course, if you use a fast weapon then a slow weapon, you’ll do more damage.[/quote]

Nope the “switching” weapons doesn’t work, I think it reads it as eating food wait time.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi-hitting
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Impossible. Oh and it’s easy: Attack with one weapon, then equip another, der.

What you can do that is really cool is attack with a rune or dragon scimitar then equip a granite maul, attack with that and a split second after the maul attacks, use it’s special twice to attack 2 more times really fast.

Oh and what I mean by impossible is that the attack interval will still have effect even if you switch weapons. Of course, if you use a fast weapon then a slow weapon, you’ll do more damage.

Read full topic
